directions.step:
1. Heat oil in skillet over medium-high heat, 2 minutes. Sprinkle pork chops with salt and pepper. Add to skillet and cook 5 minutes per side. Transfer to platter and keep warm.
2. Add shallots to pan; cook, stirring, 1 minute. Add broth, vinegar and thyme; cook, stirring, over high heat 5 minutes. Remove from heat; stir in butter. Pour over chops.
Total prep time: 20 minutes Degree of Difficulty: Easy
